import React from 'react'; const NotificationCard = ({ isLoading, data }) => { return ( <>

Notifications

{isLoading ? ( ) : ( data?.map((item) => ( <> {item.checked ? ( <>

{item.userName} Liked article: {item.articleTitle}

{item.date}
Viewed

) : ( <>

{item.userName} Liked article: {item.articleTitle}

{item.date}
New*

)} )) )} ); }; export default NotificationCard;
